description: {"blocks":[{"key":"43f7f","text":"The following document is a questionnaire for recording sampling site details. The first set of questions is for details that should be recorded every time a sample is collected from that site. The second set is to be completed once for each site to give more general details.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"8t5cm","text":"Please note, the author list is in alphabetical order and does not reflect contribution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
